title: Kannukkul Pothivaippen Lyrics Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah Song Lyrics
singerName: Charulatha Mani, Sadhana Sargam, Vijay Prakash
stanzas:
Song: Kannukkul Pothivaippen
Singers: Vijay Prakash, Sadhana Sargam, Charulatha mani,Dr.R.Ganesh
Music: M.Ghibran
Movie: Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah
Lyrics: Parvathy

Kannukull pothivaipen
en chella kannaney vaa
dhidhithajai jadhikkul
ennodu aada va va..

adikadi unnai pidikka naan, manraadida
idappuram viral madakki nee doo kaattida
en kannaney vaada vaa.
vishama kannaney vaada vaa..

Kannukull pothivaipen
en chella kannaney vaa
dhidhithajai jadhikkul
ennodu aada va va..

adikadi unnai pidikka naan, manraadida
idappuram viral madakki nee doo kaattida
en kannaney vaada vaa.
vishama kannaney vaada vaa..

Siru cittigai paasam perum kadalaai maara
manithuli ellaamey arainodikkul theera
mazhaitharaya ullam pisupisuppai theda
edharkkadi thindaattam kathakathappai kaana

NIlave inam sollaamal sollvaaye
sengothai manam un pechil thaan thaayen
unnaale yosikkiren.
un viralai pidithu nadakkum
ennidam yaasikkiren. (Kannukull pothivaipen..)

Uyir edhayo thaedum manam adhaye naadum
thaniye rendum oru vazhiyil odum
edhu edhukko poigal
edhir edhiraai meigal
edhu edhuvaai aagum
idai kadandhey pogum

kannaadi munai pol ennangal koorai
nee illaadhadhu pol ellaamey veraai
unnaale poorikkiren

Un sirippi sarathil magila
marathin poo thaikkiren.. (Kannukull pothivaipen..)
